content: Great Plains Energy Inc   the owner of regulated power utility Kansas City Power & Light  will buy bigger rival Westar Energy Inc  for $8.6 billion  the largest deal in the U.S. electricity distribution market so far this year.
name: Great Plains Energy Inc
title: U.S. regulated power firm Great Plains to buy Westar for $8.6 billion
